name: Clash Of The Undead
description:
Lead the habitant of nardia to defeat the undead. Clash Of The Undead is a roguelike auto battle simulator, where you fight the undead army and purge them from the land. Plan your strategy, use magic powers and recruit new fighters.

  • CHOOSE A RACE TO LEAD THEM

Lead them from their land, each race has its unique units, spell power, and abilities.

  • MASTER BATTLE TACTICS

From choosing your fighters to their position on the battlefield it will affect your situation.

  • USE MAGIC SPELLS

Choose from 10 unique spells to help your army on the battlefield.

  • PROCEDURAL ENEMY FORMATIONS

Each time you play the formation of the undead army will not be the same be careful!
